INPUTS: Please select the layers you want to upload, name them and associate a variable and a time to them.

Please decide if you want to create a field structure. This allows you to create a management row structure and apply all agronomic decisions to this structure. You can also create a field inspection route.

INTERpoleR is the workhorse of the mapping services. It transforms any point data into continous a continous map. First, we need an area (field boarder) where you want to create the map. Then we need a Data source, which can be either a map with point data or at least 3 elements. Finally, you can choose the Algorithm.

To create a reasonable map from point data, we need to make sure that we have complete data from the same variable and and the same time for at least 3 elements. Don't worry, we do this for you. Just select the elements, when we will offer you the available variables and time ranges. You can also choose of you want to create the map from consolidated data (e.g. daily means).

CLASSIFY helps you to find distinct zones on your field based on a map. We need a map (can be an interpolation or a satellite immage), the Algorithm, the number of classes and the smoothing factor for the resulting map.

doseR helps you to apply your input product in the right dosage across the entire field, based on an agronomic variable. Therefore, we need a map with a variable (e.g. a classified map) and the average dosage. You can also provide a minimum and maximum value.
Please give a name and type to the new Element (note that Id and coordinates are given by the system).
Please select the type (Brand) of the API connection and provide the Public and Private API keys. These information you can get from the respective company.
Please edit a message for your users, select its status and one or several users you want to send the message. The users will see the message in their next session.
Please select the users and time range you want to share the maps with.

Please define a short description (max 50 characters ). The start date is mandatory. If you define a start and an end date, a time phase will be created. Otherwise a single event will be created. You can let event repeat in an interval.
Please edit the data. Each variable needs a level of Stress, an upper ideal and a lower ideal.

AGMET provides you accurate and reliable weather data for any point on the globe. Please note that each point has a cost and this confirmation is a order. Double check if you selected the  right location.
